title: CoffeeDoor Brew Bar & Coffeeshop
subtitle: CoffeeDOOR is a coffee brand that combines freshly roasted specialty coffee, the best coffee technologies, a stylish designer interior, fast and friendly service
deliveryOptions: Within the city of Kharkiv, delivery is carried out by taxi at the carrier's rates, outside the city - by Nova Poshta at the company's rates. Orders can also be picked up at the coffee shop
